definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: I have been told my car is a complete write-off , impossible to repair.
sentences.chinese: 我已經告訴你我的汽車已經報廢了，根本不可能修好。

sentences.english: A motor vehicle which reaches the standards for being discarded as unserviceable shall not run on road.
sentences.chinese: 達到報廢標準的機動車不得上道路行駛。

sentences.english: The products need to re-repair inspection or special treatment of retirement after service time.
sentences.chinese: 產品過了使用期限，需要重新維修檢查，或報廢處理。

sentences.english: In the geothermal system of running water, floor water waste.
sentences.chinese: 導致地熱系統跑水，地板泡水報廢。

sentences.english: Phase - out product control on material to reach the minimum obsolescence cost.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格控制將要淘汰的產品用料，最大程度的減少報廢。

sentences.english: To the original management department to deal with scrap procedures and redemption new the same items.
sentences.chinese: 到原管理部門辦理報廢手續並換領新的同樣的物品。

sentences.english: This case involved a Maryland bounty system for old, abandoned cars ("hulks").
sentences.chinese: 這個案例包括馬里蘭州的收集報廢汽車的補助制。

sentences.english: Sandy's trip was written of. He encountered a shipwreck.
sentences.chinese: 桑迪的旅行報廢了，他遭遇了一起船隻失事。

sentences.english: To improve the first yield and reduce scrap.
sentences.chinese: 提升一次良率，降低報廢。

sentences.english: Involve in WIP and production scrap control.
sentences.chinese: 參與壞品數和生產報廢控制。

sentences.english: A broken-down tractor fit only for children to play on.
sentences.chinese: 報廢的拖拉機也就是適合孩子在上面玩了。

sentences.english: At some point, however, carbon-fibre cars will be scrapped.
sentences.chinese: 然而在某種程度上，碳纖維的車也是會報廢的。

sentences.english: He observed that any flaw in the fabric rolls caused it to be sold for scrap.
sentences.chinese: 他觀察到布匹上任何一個瑕疵都會使整卷布報廢。

sentences.english: Ear abrasion is a important uneffectual reason in iron and steel can.
sentences.chinese: 耳軸磨損是導致鋼鐵水包設備報廢的重要原因。

sentences.english: Corrosion failure of casing in Zhongyuan oil field is a main factor that causes oil or water well abandoned.
sentences.chinese: 在中原油田，套管腐蝕損壞是油水井報廢的主要原因。

sentences.english: Waste computer mainboards contain abundant precious metals and other valuable metals.
sentences.chinese: 報廢電腦主板中含有大量的貴金屬和賤金屬元素。

definition: to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to replace with sth new/to upgrade
to sell off/to get rid of in a sale
to become invalid/to cancel/to delete/to nullify
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
